definitions: typical of a class, group, or body of opinion

examples.text: these courses are representative of those taken by most Harvard undergraduates

shortDefinitions: typical of class, group, or body of opinion

definitions: containing typical examples of many or all types

examples.text: a representative sample of young people in the South

shortDefinitions: containing typical examples of many or all types

definitions: (of a legislative or deliberative assembly) consisting of people chosen to act and speak on behalf of a wider group

examples.text: the new government lacked a representative assembly

shortDefinitions: consisting of people chosen to act and speak on behalf of wider group

definitions: (of a government or political system) based on elected representatives
shortDefinitions: based on elected or chosen representatives

definitions: serving as a portrayal or symbol of something

examples.text: the show should be more representative of how women really are

shortDefinitions: serving as portrayal or symbol of something

examples.text: the bust involves a high degree of representative abstraction

definitions: a person chosen or appointed to act or speak for another or others

examples.text: the Duke of Gloucester would attend the coronation as the representative of his father, King George V

shortDefinitions: person chosen or appointed to act or speak for another or others

definitions: a person chosen or elected to speak and act on behalf of others in a legislative assembly or deliberative body

examples.text: the District of Columbia's representative in Congress
the Cambodian representative to the UN

shortDefinitions: person chosen to speak for others in legislative assembly

definitions: a delegate who attends a conference, negotiations, legal hearing, etc., so as to represent the interests of another person or group

examples.text: a PLO representative attending a meeting in Damascus

shortDefinitions: delegate who attends conference, negotiations, etc.

definitions: an agent of a firm who travels to potential clients to sell its products

examples.text: a sales representative for Norwich Union

shortDefinitions: agent of firm who travels to potential clients

definitions: an employee of a travel company who looks after the needs of its vacationing clients

examples.text: make your own way to the Valley Inn, where you will be contacted by our tour representative

shortDefinitions: employee of travel company who lives in resort

definitions: an example of a class or group

examples.text: fossil representatives of lampreys and hagfishes
